main event: On 5 January 1956, a pilot observed a bright light in the sky while flying over Indianapolis, Indiana.
interesting points: The sighting lasted between 5 to 10 minutes., The object was described as a bright, circular, round light., The witness initially thought the light was a jet but it moved erratically and disappeared suddenly., The witness was flying an Aero Commander at 5000 feet and reported the object being very bright., The object appeared to change direction sharply and was also seen by an air traffic controller in Chicago.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: The primary witness was a pilot of an Aero Commander aircraft flying with a passenger.; The passenger noted the object first.
